Psalms__99.2: Sing joyfully to God, all the earth: serve ye the Lord with gladness. Come in before his presence with exceeding great joy.
Psalms__99.3: Know ye that the Lord he is God: he made us, and not we ourselves. We are his people and the sheep of his pasture.
Psalms__99.4: Go ye into his gates with praise, into his courts with hymns: and give glory to him. Praise ye his name:
Psalms__99.5: For the Lord is sweet, his mercy endureth for ever, and his truth to generation and generation.
